title: karuNAnidhiyE kaDaikkaN
sahitya:
karuNAnidhiyE kaDaikkaN pArAi kamalApatiyE aruL nI gatiyE


anupallavi

  paramAtmA nIyE paNDarinAthA pApa samhArA pANDurangA


caraNam 1    bhUvilaiyan mudal dEvar munivarum bhUmiyum vandu vaNanga aruLUDan
 bhUvil yashOdaiyum nandanuminrira bhUtanai pAluDn Aviyurinjiya
   caraNam 2    dEvaki vasudEva kumArA shrIdhara rukmiNi dEvi maNALA
 dEvargaL venduyar tIrtta dayALA dIna dayApara engaLai ALAi shrI
